message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can do $145, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're serious about this product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Let me think about it for a moment...
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $137. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
